arm_group.description: MDS patients who were treated with decitabine

brief_summary.textblock:
To assess the efficacy of decitabine and identify predictors for response to decitabine
      therapy.

clinical_study.brief_title: Platelet Response During the Second Cycle of Decitabine Can Predict Response and Survival for Myelodysplastic Syndrome

detailed_description.textblock:
-  Histologically confirmed Myelodysplastic syndrome Diagnosed with MDS (de novo or
           secondary) based on the World Health Organization (WHO) classifications

        -  Survival and response Analysis

        -  Response rate

        -  Overall survival

        -  Leukemia free survival

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Histologically confirmed Myelodysplastic syndrome Diagnosed with MDS (de novo or
             secondary) based on the World Health Organization (WHO) classifications

study_pop.textblock:
Histologically confirmed Myelodysplastic syndrome Diagnosed with MDS (de novo or
        secondary) based on the World Health Organization (WHO) classifications

facility.name: Division of Hematology Oncology, Samsung Medical Center

clinical_study.official_title: Retrospective Study for Predictive Marker for Decitabine Treament in MDS Patients

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: measured from the date of decitabine therapy to the date of death or the last follow-up visit
the date of decitabine therapy to the date of death or leukemic transformation

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Retrospective
